title: As a BOC user I want to edit a Report Summary
custom_expected:
Wireframe:
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=report_summary_-_wl_coach

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Report+Summary+-+Data+Discovery
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Player+Report+Modals+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a BOC user is viewing a Report Summary in any state, there is an Edit button.
* Clicking "Edit" will reload the Report Summary in edit mode per the provided data discovery and wireframe. 
* For any MLB Players contained in the Report Summary, there is an "Edit Report" button available in edit mode. 
* Clicking "Edit Report" will open the modal. The appropriate fields display depending on which position is selected (see wires and data discovery). 
* Clicking "Cancel" on the modal will cancel any edits made, close the modal and return the user to the Report Summary in edit mode. 
* The user has the ability to complete the modal and click "OK". 
* Clicking "OK" stores the edits made, closes the modal and returns the user to the Report Summary in edit mode. 
* Users are able to remove players from the Report in edit mode by using the trash can icon. 
* Users are able to add a player to the Report in edit mode by using the "Add Player" button.
* Clicking "Add Player" adds a row to the report summary, with the user able to pick a MLB Player (population of players is anyone currently on any MLB Org's MJ or MN Roster). 
* Once a player is selected, the Player field disables, the MLB Org populates and the "Edit Report" button becomes available for the player.

title: As a BOC user I want to view the Box Score for a position player
custom_expected:
Wireframe:
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=pos___catcher
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=player_report_modal

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Player+Report+Modals+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* For players that have detailed stats available from BAM for the game the "Box Score" column will be populated with a checkbox. 
* When clicking on "View Report" for any position player (including catchers) that has a Box Score available, the report modal will include a section with the Box Score and the corresponding stats. 
* The Box Score portion of the modal will match the provided data discovery and wireframes. 
* The stats provided will match those that can be found for the player and game at mlb.com.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to Generate the Performance Report from the Club Communication widget
custom_expected:
Wireframe:
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=club_comm_widget_-_boc

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a BOC user is viewing the Club Communication widget there is a "Generate Report" button. 
* Clicking the Generate Report button will launch the Business Objects prompt for the Winter League Performance Report. 
* The user should be able to use Business Objects to run the report according to their desired parameters.

title: As a BOC user I want to Publish a Report Summary
custom_expected:
Wireframe:
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=report_summary_-_boc

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Report+Summary+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a BOC user is viewing a Report Summary in the Draft status, there is a "Publish to Clubs" button displayed in either edit mode or view mode. 
* Clicking "Publish to Clubs" will update the Report Summary's status to Published.

title: As a BOC user I want to Re-Open a Report Summary
custom_expected:
Wireframe:
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=report_summary_-_boc

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Report+Summary+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a BOC user is viewing a Report Summary in the Closed or Published status, there is a "Reopen" button displayed in view mode. 
* Clicking "Reopen" will update the Report Summary's status to Draft.

title: As a Winter League Club user I want to save a Report Summary as a Draft
custom_expected:
Wireframe:
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=report_summary_-_wl_coach

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Report+Summary+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a Winter League Club user is viewing a Report Summary in edit mode there is a Save button as well as a Cancel button. 
* Clicking '"Save" will save all changes made to the report, including added and removed players as well as any changes made to the individual players' report summaries. 
* Changes made to the individual players' report summaries are NOT saved in the system if the overall form is not saved after the edits are made. 
* If the report has never been saved before, then the system will update the status of the report to "Draft". 
* If the user clicks "Cancel" then the user will be prompted to confirm that they wish to lose their changes.
* If the user confirms, the screen will reload in view mode and none of the edits will be maintained.
